name: The alchemist between two worlds
description:
You play as an alchemist who stole the Philosopher's Stone. Unfortunately for you, you have triggered a cataclysm. A terrible monster is chasing you in your world.

The only way is to kill him in his world….

Arm yourself with your skills to kill him but be careful.

You are an alchemist, all skills require you to trade with something like your life, if you have nothing for me…

- The game uses Nanite and Lumen technology from UE5

INPUT : 

  • Left click = Base Spell 
  • Right click = Movement Camera
  • A : Spell Secondary
  • E : Object collected in the world
  • R: World Switch
  • ZSQD = Movement basic
